item.title: How Do i make a ban command for admin?
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

for czar source:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights == 3) {
String victim = command.substring(8);

        PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin:" + playerName + " is banning the basterd "
                + victim;
        sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned till he rots");
        appendToBanned(victim);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                }
            }
        }[/code]

The “playerRights == 3” Means that only admins can use this command. If your Server has “Secret Admins” use “playerRights <= 3”

Read full topic
